DataElement.preferredName: Chart Abstraction Pregnancy Pregnancy Birth Mode Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The process of reading the record of a health encounter to determine and document the condition the patient had, the cause, and the treatment prescribed. This information is typically assigned standard clinical terminology codes._The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth._The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth._The event of being born._A particular functioning condition or arrangement._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
